message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $130 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $140. That's my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $135.
